content.rendered:
Tuesday March 7th, 2023

6:00-8:00 PM

Attend Online or In-Person at the Arkansas Regional Innovation Hub at 204 E 4th St., North Little Rock, AR.

Women represent only 28% of the field, and we can do better! Girls in grades 6th-12th are invited to join us for an exciting evening to explore the endless possibilities of STEM careers. Girls who attend the summit will:

-Hear a motivational and inspirational keynote welcome by a woman in STEM.

-Participate in hands-on workshops led by local STEM professionals.

-Participate in a discussion panel led by women currently working in or pursuing a career in STEM.

Registration is required, and you can register online using this form!
